nhc_headline: ...MILTON MOVING OFF THE FLORIDA EAST COAST... ...STILL PRODUCING DAMAGING HURRICANE-FORCE WINDS AND HEAVY RAINFALL IN EAST-CENTRAL FLORIDA...
summary:
...MILTON MOVING OFF THE FLORIDA EAST COAST... ...STILL PRODUCING DAMAGING HURRICANE-FORCE WINDS AND HEAVY RAINFALL IN EAST-CENTRAL FLORIDA...
 As of 5:00 AM EDT Thu Oct 10
 the center of Milton was located near 28.5, -80.5
 with movement NE at 18 mph.
 The minimum central pressure was 976 mb
 with maximum sustained winds of about 85 mph.
